Name: Let the Desert Bloom
Desc: A large rucksack whose origins are shrouded in mystery. It looks similar to the backpacks used by Forest Rangers, but the materials used indicate its design is focused on resisting damage from sandstorms. The compartments inside are tightly sealed, and in an emergency, this backpack can even be used to store water.\nInside one of the backpack's many internal storage spaces is a guide to plants. The person who designed this backpack must have hoped that someone would strap it on, and scatter seeds bearing the potential to bloom out into the deepest reaches of the desert...
